short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Efficiently summarize web content for enhanced browsing, condensing articles into succinct insights.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The extension enables users to efficiently summarize web content, leveraging advanced natural language processing techniques. It seamlessly integrates into the browser environment, providing users with succinct summaries of lengthy articles, blog posts, or research papers. With a streamlined interface, users can quickly extract key insights from web pages, enhancing productivity and facilitating information consumption. The extension's intuitive design and powerful summarization capabilities make it a valuable tool for individuals seeking to digest complex information more effectively while browsing the web.
